issues.title: Add Dart implementation
issues.author: elliotwutingfeng
issues.body:
I have ported ipcrypt over to Dart. It is most similar to the JavaScript and Go implementations. The Dart library is available at <https://pub.dev/packages/ipcrypt>.

It uses [pointycastle](https://pub.dev/packages/pointycastle) for its AES implementation in **ipcrypt-deterministic** and **ipcrypt-ndx**. 

For **ipcrypt-nd**, KIASU-BC is directly ported from ipcrypt-js.

comments.author: jedisct1
comments.body:
Thank you!

This is great work!

comments.author: jedisct1
comments.body: Your implementation has been added to the website. Thanks again!
